Game.Name: DaGeDar
Game.Plot: Each DaGeDar holds a unique “spirit within” that offers an advantage to the player during each race. Using sharp reflexes players do battle in a game of speed and skill as they race their DaGeDar ball to the end of a virtual raceway. Each raceway is composed lanes that loop, drop, climb and bank - but also contain blocks and gaps that will knock the player off their game. 100 basic DaGeDar balls to unlock and choose from. Each ball carries abilities of Acceleration, Top Speed, Defense, and Attack. Single or Multi-Player game play. 2 balls are in play at a time. 50 fast and furious raceways. Typical race time is 2-3 min. • Collectables: Unlock and collect up to 100 DaGeDar racing balls, for collectible and trading fun! • Unique Race Abilities: Each ball carries abilities of Acceleration, Top Speed, Defense and Attack modes.
